title: Exclusive NFT Mint
subtitle: Only allowlisted wallets can mint our exclusive NFT collection

wallet.notConnected: Please connect your wallet to mint

howItWorks.title: How it works:
howItWorks.step1: Connect your wallet using the button above
howItWorks.step2: We'll check if your address is on the allowlist
howItWorks.step3: If you're allowlisted, you can mint your NFT
howItWorks.step4: Each wallet can mint one NFT from this collection
